review:
I can't forget when I met Dr. Akanksha Jangid and she said "will do best for you".

It has been a pleasure being under Dr. Akanksha Jangid's care. She is a thorough professional, but has a personal touch while tending to patients. What I appreciated most about her was that she was straight us and provided clear answers to all questions.

*** ******** ****** ** **** ** **** She takes more time to listen to her patients, than any other doctor I have ever seen. She is thorough, intelligent and welcomes patient questions with thorough answers.

Even during the covid times, She ensured she attended to every patient and all necessary precautions were in place.

Thank you so much for taking care and giving me the best service possible.
Very good experience with the doctor and all staff of Indira ivf center Kolkata. This is my first visit but I feel good.

I have booked the appointment for my wife and it was related to her health. Doctor was well experienced and friendly. She is completely satisfied by the treatment given. Medicines were prescribed by the doctor. we  would like to suggest the doctor for our family and friends in future.

Very good 
Vary excellent 
Very satisfied so take the treatment from Dr. Akanksha mam I hope so will good with us in future
The doctor was very cooperative she explained the entire process in a very simplified and  detailed manner
Pregnant running 17th weeks now taking treatment under Dr. Akanksha mam very satisfied here Thanks to all.
